headline: Cincinnati mayor gives Zac Taylor, Mike Brown keys to city
author: WLWT Digital Staff
sentences: They love making plays on the field and I can promise you, the one thing we took away from last weekend is we gotta find a way to get back and win it all," Taylor said.
"The energy you people bring to our situation is incredible it has spread, it has spread throughout the city, it has spread to our players in the locker room.
But don't let anybody tell you that the Bengals aren't for real, we have a great coach and fine players and they'll find out about us down the road.
"I am so excited to announce that the first two keys of the city that I am handing out are to Mike Brown and Zac Taylor," Pureval announced.
